Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 52nd overall pick, by Cleveland in 1982...
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/2/1982 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/9/1983 with a Broken Foot, out for 6-7 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/9/1988, off Will McEnaney (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/28/1988, off Jim Farr (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1989, hitting .478 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 7/14/1990 (Going to CIN: 2B M. Lemke, 1B T. Martinez, C P. Clark. Going to STL: 2B S. Sax, P T. Henke, P L. Smith, RF B. Brower, SS J. Valdez)...
